Reviews.Title: Good camera but with alot of setup
Reviews.Author: Chad & Mandy Sterling
Reviews.Content: This is a really good camera and i am very happy with it but it does take a long time to get setup correctly and this gets difficult when you have to climb a ladder to access the menu on the cable. The daytime picture is great quality and night picture is good but not very sharp at any distance at all, its kind of cloudy but compared to my other 600tvl cameras but it is far better to see everything within the screen and the night vision distance is great. Overall this is a very good camera and i would definitly recommend but it is a little pricey and requires alot of time to setup perfect.

Reviews.Title: Poor image quality
Reviews.Author: AmazonConsumer10000
Reviews.Content: Very poor image quality, poor color balance.  Night vision mode with the IR LEDs turned on the image has a double shift.  I can't get the unit to focus clearly in night mode.  The only reason I don't make this a 1 star is because in bright sun light the image is clear.650tvl resolution is 540tvl at best.  The OSD programming functions on this unit are useless.  The BLC & HLC features don't work for anything.  So very disappointed.  Don't waste your time or money on this product.I would recommend the Evertech EV-CDM268SN 700tvl model at a 1/3 of the price of this unit, with a MUCH MUCH better performance.

Reviews.Title: Very nice.
Reviews.Author: Buyer
Reviews.Content: This was exactly what we were looking for.  Will order more if we see a future need for more cameras.

Reviews.Title: Good product like the picture
Reviews.Author: John J. Hoth
Reviews.Content: Would like to see this product improve for remote programming.  This would make it more usable. Maybe in the future the standard will change.

ProductInfo.Features:
650 TV lines of  Resolution
48 IR LED's for 120 of Night Vision
Automatically switches to infrared (black and white) mode when no light is detected
Advanced Sony CCD sensor and Effio-E digital signal processor with high-sensitivity to offer clear details and vibrant images Recognize faces up to 70 feet away!
Customizable settings including shutter speed, white balance, wide dynamic range, contrast, and High-speed Moving Object Capture function
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QD6501B EXview HAD CCD II Advance Elite 650 TV Line Resolution with 120ft of Night Vision Camera
